DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of the probiotic use in patients with periampullary cancers undergone curative or palliative treatment considering nutritional status, postoperative complications, infection rate, length of hospitalization and mortality.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Probiotics in Patients Undergoing Surgery for Periampullary Neoplasms
DOC.criteria: Patients in need of surgery for periampullary cancer Patients submitted to periampullary surgery without pathologic confirmation of cancer Patients unwilling to be a part of the trial
